post.body: Got it in the DM. Yeah I actually didn't buy this one. My relative gifted it to me.
Gimme your facebook profile link :) I have a digital camera but not SLR. Its Sony DSC - W35. 7.2MP and 3x zoom.
Oh fine fine. I like to observe pics but cannot take them in a great way. You have collections?
LOL you are going to take a new photo?
LOL that would be great if it really happened :P I can imagine it :D
LOL then we'll just leave him. He'll learn that what he is doing, is bad ;-) Does he even know we are talking about him? :P
Why not write a letter to CM about it? :D That's the only way I guess.
How much did he charge you? Surely more than RS.50? If not, I'll come there to cut my hair for RS.10.
If he says he is nature boy (lol) he doesn't need to shower. Let's keep an eye on him and make sure he doesn't. :P
Agreed. Itha valakarathuke neenga evalo kashta patirupeenga.
Leave him like that coz chennai has water scarcity. As long as he doesn't come to any of our houses, it should be fine :)
Lol try going to office like this once day when you grow your hair again
You face shows it :D
Theriyama ketuten. Please change it again. :D
Very funny. I bet very few people talked to you. Your street young boys would have been scared to even come near your house :D
Anniyan ku doop podalam :P
HAHA HAHA HAHA Awesome :D
Cool I cannot wait to see your new pic
LOL maybe you are right :)
Ok put it for one day or even one hour and then change it. All of your twitter followers are waiting to see it :P
